Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview a report with an item having TOC .
 
Build number:
2.2.0.v20061208-1051
 
Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report, add a label, add TOC for the label, preview.
 
Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.
 
Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
